author: aryanXmahajan
text:
this might be the STUPIDEST thing i've ever done...

leaking my ENTIRE automation library

here's what you get:
- 3,000+ n8n workflows including AI ad creative agents
- AI UGC system that saves $247 per video (5-minute creation)
- 100+ AI prompts that don't suck
- Claude MCP AI agents for LinkedIn automation
- AI prompts that write better than most humans
- AI Viral Content OS (complete content empire)

basically everything you need to automate your business

Like + comment “VAULT” + repost (must be following so I can DM you)

PS: only FREE for 24hrs before it goes into internal client systems
